[Home](./index.md) &gt; [blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [Field](./blockly.field.md) &gt; [render\_](./blockly.field.render_.md)

## Field.render\_() method

Used by getSize() to move/resize any DOM elements, and get the new size.

All rendering that has an effect on the size/shape of the block should be done here, and should be triggered by getSize().

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected render_(): void;
```
**Returns:**

void
